steps.title: Scene Safety & BSI
steps.subtitle: Ensure scene safety, apply gloves and eye protection. Check for hazards.

steps.title: Assess the Bleeding
steps.subtitle: Identify bleeding source and severity. Look for arterial vs venous bleeding.

steps.title: Direct Pressure
steps.subtitle: Apply firm, direct pressure with clean cloth or gauze over bleeding site.

steps.title: Elevate if Possible
steps.subtitle: Elevate injured area above heart level if no spinal injury suspected.

steps.title: Pressure Points
steps.subtitle: If bleeding continues, apply pressure to arterial pressure points.

steps.title: Tourniquet Application
steps.subtitle: For severe extremity bleeding, apply tourniquet 2â€“3 inches above wound.

steps.title: Monitor & Document
steps.subtitle: Monitor vital signs, document time of interventions, prepare for transport.
